net.sf.oval.guard
Class ParameterNameResolverParanamerImpl

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.oval.guard.ParameterNameResolverParanamerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterNameResolver
public class ParameterNameResolverParanamerImpl
extends Object
implements ParameterNameResolver

This implementation that uses com.thoughtworks.paranamer.Paranamer (http://paranamer.codehaus.org/) to determine the names of parameter names as a fallback the results of a ParameterNameResolverEnumerationImpl are returned

Author:
Sebastian Thomschke

getParameterNames

public String[] getParameterNames(Constructor<?> constructor)
                           throws ReflectionException
Returns an empty String array if no parameters are declared.

getParameterNames in interface ParameterNameResolver

Returns:
an array holding the parameter names of the given constructor.
